div.class: d-flex flex-column justify-content-center align-items-center text-center max-w-[970px]
div.p: Taqat
div.h1: Pioneering Sustainable Solutions and Humanitarian Initiatives!
div.p: In 2014, Taqat embarked on its journey with a clear objective: to provide innovative support to entrepreneurs, governmental organizations, non-governmental organizations, and humanitarian organizations. Our aim is to enable them to thrive and succeed globally, fostering excellence and efficiently enhancing local economies.

div.class: position-relative d-flex align-items-center overflow-hidden d-lg-none image-gallery
animate-marquee d-flex min-w-full flex-shrink-0 align-items-center justify-content-around

div.p: We strive for effective change and deliver integrated solutions to make a tangible impact on society!

div.class: animate-marquee d-flex min-w-full flex-shrink-0 align-items-center justify-content-around

div.p: At Taqat, a core set of values guides our decisions across all operations:

div.div: Positive engagement with communities and efficient support for humanitarian initiatives.

div.p: Taqat is home to a diverse group of companies that all share a unified vision: provide innovative and comprehensive solutions that serve the aspirations of clients and the community while effectively achieving sustainable development goals.

"Avrasya" is one of the leading global companies in providing integrated business solutions… It views every challenge as a new opportunity for innovation and works to help clients achieve effective strategic growth in the Balkans and Africa, enhancing their capacity for sustainable success.

Tawridat helps entrepreneurships and organizations establish and streamline their supply chains by providing the latest solutions in procurement, logistics, customs clearance, and digital technology to enable them to achieve the desired growth in their businesses.

a.title: Tawridat Haditha for Trade & Services
a.aria-label: Learn more about Tawridat Haditha for Trade & Services

div.p: Africat aims to achieve sustainable growth for future generations in Africa by supporting investment, developing trade, and creating job opportunities. This enables companies and individuals to expand their businesses in Africa, enhance their investments, and create a fertile environment for economic development and prosperity across various sectors.
Towards a Sustainable Future

Through our diverse programs, we offer a range of integrated services designed to support organizations in effective humanitarian efforts. We utilize advanced artificial intelligence technologies to provide innovative and rapid solutions that address the needs of those affected by crises. Our goal is to enhance the efficiency of fundraising and distribution efforts to achieve sustainable development in communities facing challenges.

a.class: btn bg-dark text-white d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between justify-content-md-center
a.title: Explore our programs

div.p: To build a sustainable future, we support investments and projects that drive economic growth by:
We achieve all this by supporting investment and projects that enhance economic growth in the fields of agriculture, industry, and trade. We aim to raise living standards and self-reliance rates.

We focus on implementing innovative and sustainable projects that aim to improve the lives of individuals aQnd promote community development. We endeavour to achieve a tangible positive impact that reflects our values and vision to support humanity.

Pearl Pixels is a creative marketing agency that helps businesses and organizations improve their marketing operations and reach their audience more effectively. To achieve this, Pearl Pixels provides innovative marketing solutions, including developing successful strategies for advertising campaigns, event management, and digital marketing.

To provide an innovative and convenient e-commerce experience, the OKSOUQ platform was developed as an extraordinary online marketplace. It aims to empower individuals to access a wide variety of high-quality products at the best prices, such as electronics, perfumes, watches, furniture, and more.

Taqat for Technology was established as a leading center that designs the latest technologies and solutions, including software development, automation, and artificial intelligence. Its mission is clear: enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of digital transformation processes across various sectors!

To ensure effective sustainability in developing local and global real estate markets, Taqat for Real Estate Development focuses on innovatively developing residential and commercial properties. We provide creative designs that meet market needs and achieve the highest quality standards.

Recognizing that buying, selling, and renting properties can be complex, Taqat for Real Estate Brokerage simplifies this process effectively. We provide professional services that help clients smoothly access the best available options and offer expert real estate consultancy to assist clients in making informed investment decisions.

Maintenance, repairs, and renovations of the highest quality... all of this and more is provided by Taqat for Facility Management to ensure the safety of all types of properties by providing integrated preventative maintenance services that align with the nature and type of your property, to ensure that your investment remains in optimal condition.

Taqat for HR Services specializes in providing a wide range of human resources services and consulting. We help organizations enhance their hiring processes, manage talent and teams, and develop operational efficiency, leading to seamless, high performance.

Taqat for Customer Service Solutions focuses on empowering you to provide exceptional customer service by helping you develop and implement a comprehensive call center management strategy. We also aid in creatively enhancing your customer experience and effectively improving the skills of your customer service team.
